quality_assessment: Excellent troubleshooting documentation with comprehensive coverage of common issues. Well-structured with practical solutions and detailed debugging techniques. Minor gaps in newer features and some outdated command references.

issues.description: Missing troubleshooting guidance for workflow composition features (templates, inheritance, circular dependencies)
issues.fix_suggestion: The common-error-messages.md includes template errors ('Template not found', 'Circular dependency detected') but index.md doesn't have a dedicated common issue section for composition problems. Consider adding a section in index.md for composition-related troubleshooting.

issues.description: Goal seek command type is not covered in troubleshooting documentation
issues.fix_suggestion: Add troubleshooting section for goal_seek issues: score calculation problems, convergence failures, threshold configuration, and iteration limits.

issues.description: Validate command type troubleshooting is not covered
issues.fix_suggestion: Add troubleshooting for validate command issues: schema validation failures, completeness threshold problems, gap-filling errors.

issues.description: No troubleshooting guidance for circuit breaker failures
issues.fix_suggestion: Add debug tips for circuit breaker states: identifying open circuits, adjusting thresholds, monitoring half-open requests.

issues.description: FAQ mentions 'prodigy events ls --job-id' which may not match actual CLI
issues.should_be: Need to verify actual CLI command syntax from src/cli/commands/events.rs
issues.fix_suggestion: Verify the exact CLI syntax for events commands and update if incorrect. Check if it's 'ls', 'list', or another subcommand.

issues.description: No guidance on debugging profile selection and profile-specific variable issues
issues.fix_suggestion: Add debug tips for profile issues: verifying active profile, checking profile-specific values, debugging profile fallback behavior.

issues.description: Best practices don't cover debugging sub-workflows or nested workflow execution
issues.fix_suggestion: Add section on debugging sub-workflows: result passing between workflows, context isolation, failure propagation.
Add troubleshooting for write_file issues: permission errors, format validation, directory creation failures, variable interpolation in content.

positive_aspects: Comprehensive coverage of MapReduce troubleshooting with DLQ, checkpoint, and resume issues
Excellent variable interpolation debugging guidance with practical examples
Very detailed Claude log analysis techniques with jq examples
Well-organized quick reference table for common error messages
Strong worktree debugging section with git commands
Practical debugging environment variables documented with sources
Good cross-references to other documentation pages
All internal links validated and working
Checkpoint inspection section is very thorough with recovery strategies
Performance debugging section with timing analysis commands
improvement_suggestions: Add troubleshooting for newer workflow composition features (templates, inheritance)
Include goal_seek and validate command troubleshooting sections
Verify and update CLI command syntax for events commands
Consider adding a 'Troubleshooting by Feature' index to help users find relevant sections quickly

metadata.validation_focus: Check troubleshooting covers common user issues
metadata.link_validation: All internal links validated successfully (4 files checked)
